tasks.name: Musical Imagery Task
tasks.definition: Participants continuously imagine an 8-minute symphony as a silent movie cue during fMRI sessions. The visualization of the music serves as a real-time cue to inform subjects of the content of musical imagery and control the timing of the imagery process.
